54 Waypoint_Edit::Waypoint_Edit(ros::NodeHandle _nh)
55  : ps3_start_(0)
56  , ps3_pre_start_(0)
57  , ps3_select_(0)
58  , counter_(0)
59 {
60 //to get ps3 data---
61  nh_ = _nh;
62  ps3_sub_ = nh_.subscribe("/joy",1, &Waypoint_Edit::getPS3,this);
63 //--
64  pkg_path_ = ros::package::getPath("task_editor");
65 
66 }
67 
68 void Waypoint_Edit::getPS3(const sensor_msgs::JoyPtr& _ps3){
69  ps3_start_ = _ps3->buttons[3];
70  ps3_select_ = _ps3->buttons[0];
71 
72  static tf::TransformBroadcaster br_now;
73  static tf::TransformBroadcaster br_all;
74  tf::StampedTransform transform_now;
75  tf::StampedTransform transform_all;
76  tf::Quaternion q;
77 
78  move_base_msgs::MoveBaseGoal goal;
79 
80  //スタートボタンが押されたら現在値の座標（TF）をwaypointsとして登録する
81  if (ps3_start_ == 0 && ps3_pre_start_ == 1){
82  try{
83  listener_.lookupTransform("/map", "/base_link",ros::Time(0), transform_now);
84 
85  //save postion------------
86  std::ofstream ofs(pkg_path_ + "/config/waypoints.yaml", std::ios_base::app);
87  ofs << "- pose:" << std::endl;
88  ofs << " position:" << std::endl;
89  ofs << " x: " << transform_now.getOrigin().x() << std::endl;
90  ofs << " y: " << transform_now.getOrigin().y() << std::endl;
91  ofs << " z: " << transform_now.getOrigin().z() << std::endl;
92  ofs << " orientation:" << std::endl;
93  ofs << " x: " << transform_now.getRotation().x() << std::endl;
94  ofs << " y: " << transform_now.getRotation().y() << std::endl;
95  ofs << " z: " << transform_now.getRotation().z() << std::endl;
96  ofs << " w: " << transform_now.getRotation().w() << std::endl;
97  //------------------------------
98 
99  br_now.sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(transform_now, ros::Time::now(), "map", "savepoint" + std::to_string(counter_) ) );
100 
101  counter_ += 1;
102  }
103  catch (tf::TransformException ex){
104  ROS_ERROR("%s",ex.what());
105  ros::Duration(1.0).sleep();
106  }
107  }
108  //セレクトボタンが押されたら登録されているwaypointsをTFとして発行する
109  else if (ps3_select_ == 1){ //readm yaml file
110  YAML::Node config = YAML::LoadFile(pkg_path_ + "/config/waypoints.yaml");
111  const YAML::Node &wp_node_tmp = config;
112  const YAML::Node *wp_node = wp_node_tmp ? &wp_node_tmp : NULL;
113  if(wp_node != NULL){
114  for(int i=0; i < wp_node->size(); i++){
115  goal.target_pose.pose.position.x = (*wp_node)[i]["pose"]["position"]["x"].as<float>() ;
116  goal.target_pose.pose.position.y = (*wp_node)[i]["pose"]["position"]["y"].as<float>() ;
117  goal.target_pose.pose.position.z = (*wp_node)[i]["pose"]["position"]["z"].as<float>() ;
118  goal.target_pose.pose.orientation.x = (*wp_node)[i]["pose"]["orientation"]["x"].as<float>() ;
119  goal.target_pose.pose.orientation.y = (*wp_node)[i]["pose"]["orientation"]["y"].as<float>() ;
120  goal.target_pose.pose.orientation.z = (*wp_node)[i]["pose"]["orientation"]["z"].as<float>() ;
121  goal.target_pose.pose.orientation.w = (*wp_node)[i]["pose"]["orientation"]["w"].as<float>() ;
122 
123  transform_all.setOrigin( tf::Vector3(goal.target_pose.pose.position.x, goal.target_pose.pose.position.y, goal.target_pose.pose.position.z) );
124  q.setRPY(0,0,tf::getYaw(goal.target_pose.pose.orientation));
125  transform_all.setRotation(q);
126 
127  br_all.sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(transform_all, ros::Time::now(), "map", "waypoint" + std::to_string(i)));
128 
129  }
130  }
131  }
132  //L1,L2,R1,R2ボタンが同時押しされたら、waypointsをyamlファイルごと削除する
133  else if (_ps3->buttons[8] == 1 && _ps3->buttons[9] == 1 && _ps3->buttons[10] == 1 && _ps3->buttons[11] == 1){
134  //L1,L2,R1,R2 == 1
135  std::ofstream ofs(pkg_path_ + "/config/waypoints.yaml", std::ios_base::trunc);
136  }
137 
138  ps3_pre_start_ = ps3_start_;
139 
140 }

144  ros::init(argc,argv,"waypoints_editor");

147  Waypoint_Edit we(nh);
148

150 
151  return 0;
